analysis.description:
dPonzi.enter (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d3b6b1360fa83482ed0284f9b9ac4e48edbcaa5.sol#73-128) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- advisor.transfer(potCntInfo[i].entryAmount * multiplier) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d3b6b1360fa83482ed0284f9b9ac4e48edbcaa5.sol#105)

dPonzi.addPlayerMapping (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d3b6b1360fa83482ed0284f9b9ac4e48edbcaa5.sol#128-179) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now % 86400 == 0
	- now % 86400 == 0
	- now % 86400 == 0

dPonzi.sendFoods has external calls inside a loop:
	- p[k].transfer(food[k]) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d3b6b1360fa83482ed0284f9b9ac4e48edbcaa5.sol#342)
